attribute-definition.name: TINA Location
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.custom-validation-message: TINA Location has to be in a format of '10 charachters - 10 charachters' or '21 characters'

attribute-definition.name: Billing Account
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.custom-validation-message: Billing Account can only contain numbers

attribute-definition.name: Billing Account
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.custom-validation-message: Billing Account can only contain numbers

attribute-definition.name: IPC Number
attribute-definition.label: Phone Number
attribute-definition.list-columns: Number Type, Number Source, Telephone Number (Individual),Telephone Number (From),Telephone Number (To)

attribute-definition.name: Base Licence Recurring Charge
attribute-definition.label: FreePhone Business license recurring charge
attribute-definition.line-item-description: "FreePhone Business Licence charge for " & {Number of Users Base Licence} & " users"

attribute-definition.name: Number of Users Base Licence
attribute-definition.label: Number of FreePhone Business license Users

attribute-definition.name: Base Licence List Recurring Charge
attribute-definition.label: FreePhone Business license List Recurring Charge

attribute-definition.name: Advanced Licence Recurring Charge
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.line-item-description: "Advanced Licence charge for " & {Number of Users Advanced Licence} & " users"

attribute-definition.name: Advanced Licence Promotion
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.line-item-description: Advanced Licence 1 Month Free of Charge

attribute-definition.name: Requested Activation Date
attribute-definition.label: null
attribute-definition.custom-validation-message: Please enter date in dd/mm/yyyy format only.

attribute-definition.name: Number of Ceased Users Base Licence
attribute-definition.label: Number of Deleted Users FreePhone Business license

attribute-definition.name: Number of Ceased Users Advanced Licence
attribute-definition.label: Number of Deleted Users Advanced Licence

attribute-definition.name: Total Number of Users from Service
attribute-definition.label: null

attribute-definition.name: Number of Base Licence Users from Service
attribute-definition.label: null

attribute-definition.name: Number of Added Users Base Licence
attribute-definition.label: Number of Added Users FreePhone Business license

attribute-definition.name: MessageListener
attribute-definition.default-value:
<script type='text/javascript'>
//Used to rerun rules when message received
csCustomUtilityMethods = {
"executeAllRules" : function() {
CS.rules.evaluateAllRules();
return {"value": "Execution of rules initiated on CFG window ... "};
}
}
CS.messageApi.registerCustomCommands(csCustomUtilityMethods);
</script>
attribute-definition.label: null

rule.name: Rule 618
rule.description: When -> Execute JavaScript; Execute JavaScript; Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 619
rule.description: When {IPC:Activation Automatic Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Apply Activation Promotion} to Yes.

rule.name: Rule 620
rule.description: When {IPC:Apply Activation Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Activation Promotion} to 0-{Activation Charge}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Activation Promotion} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 621
rule.description: When {IPC:Activation Promotion} is not '0' -> Set Price of {IPC:Activation Promotion} to {Activation Promotion}; Add Attribute to Line Items {IPC:Activation Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Activation Charge Promotion} to {$Lookup(ActivationChargePromotionQuery):id}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {IPC:Activation Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Activation Charge Promotion} to null.

rule.name: Rule 622
rule.description: When {IPC:Total Number of Users} is greater than '0' -> Set Value of {IPC:Activation Charge} to {Activation List Charge}*{Total Number of Users}; Set Price of {IPC:Activation Charge} to {Activation Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Activation Charge} to {$Lookup(ActivationChargeQuery):id}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Activation Charge} to 0; Set Price of {IPC:Activation Charge} to {Activation Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Activation Charge} to null.

rule.name: Rule 623
rule.description: When -> Set Value of Attribute Field {Installation:Installation Charge.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(InstallationChargeQuery):id}.

rule.name: Rule 624
rule.description: When {Installation:Installation Automatic Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {Installation:Apply Installation Promotion} to Yes.

rule.name: Rule 625
rule.description: When {Installation:Installation Promotion} is not '0' -> Set Price of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to {Installation Promotion}; Add Attribute to Line Items {Installation:Installation Promotion}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {Installation:Installation Promotion}.

rule.name: Rule 626
rule.description: When {Installation:Apply Installation Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of Attribute Field {Installation:Installation Promotion.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(InstallationChargePromotionQuery):id}; Set Value of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to 0-{Installation Charge}. Otherwise: Set Value of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 627
rule.description: When -> Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 628
rule.description: When {IPC:Base Licence} equals 'Yes' -> Make Attribute Mandatory {IPC:Number of Users Base Licence}. Otherwise: Make Attribute Optional {IPC:Number of Users Base Licence}; Make Attribute Read-Only; Set Value of {IPC:Number of Users Base Licence} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 629
rule.description: When {IPC:Advanced Licence} equals 'Yes' -> Make Attribute Mandatory {IPC:Number of Users Advanced Licence}. Otherwise: Make Attribute Optional {IPC:Number of Users Advanced Licence}; Make Attribute Read-Only; Set Value of {IPC:Number of Users Advanced Licence} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 630
rule.description: When {IPC:Total Number of Users} is not '{Number of Users Advanced Licence}+{Number of Users Base Licence}' -> Mark Configuration Invalid.

rule.name: Rule 631
rule.description: When {IPC:Number of Users Base Licence} is greater than '0' -> Set Value of {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge} to {Base Licence List Recurring Charge}*{Number of Users Base Licence}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 632
rule.description: When {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge} is greater than '0' -> Set Price of {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge} to {Base Licence Recurring Charge}; Add Attribute to Line Items {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Base Licence Charge} to {$Lookup(BaseLicenceChargeQuery):id}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {IPC:Base Licence Recurring Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Base Licence Charge} to null.

rule.name: Rule 633
rule.description: When {IPC:Base Licence Automatic Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Apply Base Licence Promotion} to Yes.

rule.name: Rule 634
rule.description: When {IPC:Apply Base Licence Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Base Licence Promotion} to 0-{Base Licence Recurring Charge}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Base Licence Promotion} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 635
rule.description: When {IPC:Base Licence Promotion} is not '0' -> Set Price of {IPC:Base Licence Promotion} to {Base Licence Promotion}; Add Attribute to Line Items {IPC:Base Licence Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Base Licence Promotion} to {$Lookup(BaseLicenceChargePromotionQuery):id}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {IPC:Base Licence Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Base Licence Promotion} to null.

rule.name: Rule 636
rule.description: When {IPC:Number of Users Advanced Licence} is greater than '0' -> Set Value of {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge} to {Advanced Licence List Recurring Charge}*{Number of Users Advanced Licence}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 637
rule.description: When {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge} is greater than '0' -> Set Price of {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge} to {Advanced Licence Recurring Charge}; Add Attribute to Line Items {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Advanced Licence Charge} to {$Lookup(AdvancedLicenceChargeQuery):id}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Advanced Licence Charge} to null.

rule.name: Rule 638
rule.description: When {IPC:Advanced Licence Automatic Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Apply Advanced Licence Promotion} to Yes.

rule.name: Rule 639
rule.description: When {IPC:Apply Advanced Licence Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion} to 0-{Advanced Licence Recurring Charge}. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 640
rule.description: When {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion} is not '0' -> Set Price of {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion} to {Advanced Licence Promotion}; Add Attribute to Line Items {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Advanced Licence Promotion} to {$Lookup(AdvancedLicenceChargePromotionQuery):id}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {IPC:Advanced Licence Promotion}; Set Value of {IPC:KenanTableId Advanced Licence Promotion} to null.

rule.name: Rule 641
rule.description: When {IPC:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only; Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 642
rule.description: When {IPC:OpportunityId} is not '' AND {IPC:Offer} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 643
rule.description: When {Installation:Offer} is not '' AND {Installation:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 644
rule.description: When {Installation:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 645
rule.description: When {IPC:Total Number of Users} is less than '1' OR {IPC:IPC Number} is blank -> Mark Configuration Invalid.

rule.name: Rule 646
rule.description: When {IPC:Business Identifier} is blank AND {IPC:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 647
rule.description: When {Installation:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Set Value of {Installation:Installation Automatic Promotion} to No; Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 648
rule.description: When {IPC:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Set Value of {IPC:Advanced Licence Automatic Promotion} to false; Set Value of {IPC:Activation Automatic Promotion} to false; Set Value of {IPC:Base Licence Automatic Promotion} to false.

rule.name: Rule 649
rule.description: When -> Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 650
rule.description: When {IPC:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 651
rule.description: When {IPC:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Execute JavaScript. Otherwise: Set Value of {IPC:iFrameAllDeleteUsers} to null.

rule.name: Rule 652
rule.description: When {IPC:BundleID} is not '{InstallationBundleId}' AND {IPC:InstallationBundleId} is not '' -> Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 653
rule.description: When {IPC:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Set Value of {IPC:Number of Users Base Licence} to ({Number of Base Licence Users from Service}+{Number of Added Users Base Licence})-{Number of Ceased Users Base Licence}; Set Value of {IPC:Total Number of Users} to ({Total Number of Users from Service}+{Total Number of Added Users})-{Total Number of Ceased Users}.

rule.name: Rule 654
rule.description: When {IPC:Change Type} equals '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only; Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 655
rule.description: When {IPC:Requested Activation Date} is not '' -> Execute JavaScript.

rule.name: Rule 656
rule.description: When {IPC:Requested Activation Date Validation} equals 'Yes' -> Mark Configuration Invalid.

predicate.label: {IPC:Advanced Licence Recurring Charge} is greater than '0'

predicate.name: Predicate 445
predicate.subject: a2eM0000003lpb9IAA
predicate.label: {IPC:Total Number of Users} is less than '1'
